title: rillyaml
description: The rill.yaml file contains metadata about your project.

compiler.description: Specifies the parser version to use for compiling resources

display_name.description: The display name of the project, shown in the upper-left corner of the UI

description.description: A brief description of the project

ai_context.description: Extra context for LLM/AI features. Used to guide natural language question answering and routing.

olap_connector.description: Specifies the default OLAP engine for the project. Defaults to duckdb if not set

models.description: Defines project-wide default settings for models. Unless overridden, individual models will inherit these defaults

metrics_views.description: Defines project-wide default settings for metrics_views. Unless overridden, individual metrics_views will inherit these defaults

explores.description: Defines project-wide default settings for explores. Unless overridden, individual explores will inherit these defaults

features.description: Enables or disables experimental or optional features using key-value pairs, where the key is the feature name and the value is a boolean

public_paths.description: List of file or directory paths to expose over HTTP. Defaults to ['./public']

ignore_paths.description: A list of file or directory paths to exclude from parsing. Useful for ignoring extraneous or non-Rill files in the project

mock_users.description: A list of mock users used to test dashboard security policies within the project

email.description: The email address of the mock user. This field is required

name.description: The name of the mock user.

admin.description: Indicates whether the mock user has administrative privileges

groups.description: An array of group names that the mock user is a member of
